p: A recent study comprising 468 lung transplant patients showed that 2.1% of them tested positive for HEV RNA. The patients had elevated liver function test results and the recipients who survived for longer than six months were diagnosed as having chronic HEV infections. All the HEV were of genotype 3 strains, as shown by viral genotyping [ 119]. Pas et al. (2012) reported chronic hepatitis in 1 out of 53 lung transplant recipients [ 99].
